title: Vivaldi's Venice
brief_description: Six 18th century concerti of Vivaldi sustain the sensuous poetry of the camera as it reflects Venice’s glories and variety of moods through Vivaldi’s, The 4 Seasons - Winter-Autumn Concerto. (Award: “Osella D’Argento” 30th International Exhibition of Cinematographic Art, Venice, August 1969)
